country-year: Foreign direct investment in developing countries

Development Initiatives based on numerous sources. Financing-type data sources: US - Bureau of Economic Analysis, UK - Office of National Statistics, Germany - Deutche Bundesbank, France - Banque de France, Denmark - Denmark NationalBank. Bilateral FDI data source: OECD FDI by partner database
Converted to constant 2012 US$. Note that negative values have been excluded here.
